alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 18 at 9:50AM CDT until May 22 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River at Fort Ripley affecting Morrison and Crow Wing Counties. Mississippi River At Aitkin affecting Aitkin and Crow Wing Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Fort Ripley. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, This will cause minor flooding of rural areas near Fort Ripley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM CDT Wednesday was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.1 feet on 04/22/1996. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Mississippi River Fort Ripley 10.5 11.1 Wed 8 am CDT 11.1 11.0 10.8 &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1030 AM CDT.
